divs: Sighting Detailsokay so i was putting the car seat in my mothers car and my wife comes out and says " babe did you see that?" i looked at the sky and saw nothing at the moment i was about to turn my head to deny seeing anything a white light in the shape of a ball appeared it got smaller then bigger all within a matter of 2 to 3 minutes it all happened so fast i do not know hot to explain it the darkest patch in the sky could not of been a satellite or a plane ive been living here for 5 years and never seen such a thing.MY WIFE says she came outside because she saw from a window this white object moving in the the air as no plane would she says it looked as if it was bouncing in the air she came outside to ask me what i thought and boom thats where i started my story!!
